author: ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN
title: The Conflict pits two struggling offenses
text:
Friday, October 9, 2015 11:41 PM EDT 
The Conflict pits two struggling offenses BY ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN EAST HARTFORD, CT--- -090315JS05- UConn's Bryant Shirreffs (4) takes the helm as quarterback during their season opening game against Villanova Thursday at Pratt & Whitney Stadium at Rentschler Field in East Hartford.
